We are focused on pushing the state-of-the-art in multimodal understanding, generation, editing, long-term planning and tool use. 3D scene reconstruction– Advancing techniques for generating high-quality, structured 3D environments from images, or video inputs. This project will involve efficient and accurate scene reconstruction while utilizing limited number of images or video sequence.

Conduct research in deep learning and generative AI, focusing on foundational models for image, video, and 3D generation
